name: MP3 Video Converter
description: Convert video to MP3 format, convert video to audio file, convert MP4 to MP3. Convert all your music files on Android device. With MP3 converter, you can convert, change bitrate and trim your video or audio with various options to create new audio file.  Function: - Convert video to MP3, audio format. - Convert MP3 to other audio formats. - Convert videos saved on your device to audio files. - Set audio converted as default ringtone. - Free MP3 converter. - Offline MP3 converter.  Supported conversion example: - Convert MP4 to MP3, WAV, AAC, M4A - Convert FLV to MP3, Wav, AAC, M4A - Convert videos to MP3, WAV, AAC, M4A - Convert MP3 to AAC, Mp3 to WMA  - Convert AAC to Mp3, AAC to WMA - Convert Flac to Mp3, Flac to AAC  - Convert videos on your device to MP3, AAC, M4A, WAV  Step by step instructions for using the MP3 Converter 1) Select video or audio file you want to convert. 2) Select audio format (MP3 or AAC) and Bitrate. 3) Add information for MP3 format (title, album, artist). 4) Click the  convert  button.  Attention: * Conversion speed depends on your mobile specifications. * This application is not a youtube downloader or mp3 downloader. It only converts audio files from your device.  Download it, use the free MP3 converter application now.
